commit message:
Automatic sync on app start/exit.

Automatically sync if the last sync was more than 10 minutes ago at `onCollectionLoaded` and `onKeyDown`.

Default to 'false'.

See https://code.google.com/p/ankidroid/issues/detail?id=1062

Merge pull request #900 from x-ji/auto_sync

Added auto sync on start/exit

Merge pull request #899 from stream101/timeout

Add timeout for Http requests

Correctly show Acra reporting mode in debug mode
Fixes #3569

Merge pull request #3575 from timrae/debug-reporting-mode

Correctly show Acra reporting mode in debug mode
